name: Quasimodo Remake
description:
Remake of the classic game 'Quasimodo' for the Atari 8bit computers.

- Help Quasi to recover the stolen jewels. 

- Fight the soldiers by throwing barrels

- Climb to the tower by swing between the bells, avoiding the evil bats and ghost.

Controls

- CTRL: Start Game, Pick/Throw Barrels, Jump

- LEFT - RIGHT : Move, Aim barrels while pressing CTRL.

- UP/DOWN: Move up/down in ladders and bell ropes. 

- DOWN: Make a dodge move to avoid enemy arrows.
